title: Terms of Service
content:
These Terms of Service (hereinafter referred to as 'the Terms') set forth the conditions for using the services (hereinafter referred to as 'the Service') provided on this website by Useful Apps Collection (hereinafter referred to as 'the Site'). Registered users (hereinafter referred to as 'Users') shall use the Service in accordance with these Terms.

## Article 1 (Application)
These Terms shall apply to all relationships between the User and the Site concerning the use of the Service.

## Article 2 (User Registration)

The Site may choose not to approve an application for user registration if it determines that the applicant has any of the following reasons, and shall not be obligated to disclose the reasons therefor.

  * If the application is from a person who has previously violated these Terms.

## Article 3 (Management of User ID and Password)
Users shall manage their user ID and password for the Service at their own responsibility.
Users may not, under any circumstances, transfer or lend their user ID and password to a third party, or share them with a third party. When a login is made with a combination of user ID and password that matches the registered information, the Site will deem it as use by the user who registered that user ID.

## Article 4 (Prohibited Matters)
In using the Service, Users shall not engage in the following acts:

  * Acts related to criminal activity.
  * Acts that destroy or interfere with the functions of the servers or networks of the Site, other users of the Service, or third parties.
  * Acts that may interfere with the operation of the Site's services.
  * Acts of collecting or accumulating personal information about other users.
  * Acts of unauthorized access or attempts thereof.
  * Acts of impersonating another user.
  * Acts of directly or indirectly providing benefits to anti-social forces in connection with the Site's services.
  * Acts that infringe on the intellectual property rights, portrait rights, privacy, honor, or other rights or interests of the Site, other users of the Service, or third parties.
  * Acts of posting or transmitting expressions that are excessively violent; sexually explicit; lead to discrimination based on race, nationality, creed, sex, social status, family origin, etc.; induce or encourage suicide, self-harm, or drug abuse; or are otherwise antisocial and cause discomfort to others.
  * Acts for the purpose of business, advertising, solicitation, or other commercial purposes (except those approved by the Site); for the purpose of sexual acts or obscene acts; for the purpose of meeting or dating strangers of the opposite sex; for the purpose of harassing or slandering other users; or any other use of the Service for a purpose different from the intended purpose of the Service.
  * Religious activities or solicitation to religious groups.
  * Other acts that the Site deems inappropriate.

## Article 5 (Suspension of the Provision of the Service, etc.)
The Site may suspend or interrupt the provision of all or part of the Service without prior notice to the User if it determines that any of the following reasons exist:

  * When a computer or communication line stops due to an accident.
  * In any other case where the Site determines that it is difficult to provide the Service.
The Site shall not be liable for any disadvantage or damage suffered by the User or a third party due to the suspension or interruption of the provision of the Service.

The copyright for text, images, videos, etc., posted or uploaded by the User using the Service shall be reserved to the said User or other existing rights holders. ## Article 7 (Usage Restrictions and Registration Deletion)
The Site may, without prior notice, delete posted data, restrict the use of all or part of the Service for the User, or delete the User's registration if the User falls under any of the following:

If any of the items in the preceding paragraph apply, the User shall naturally lose the benefit of time for all debts owed to the Site and must immediately repay all obligations in full.
